snippet: There is a reason why Juan Martin del Potro went under the knife -- over... and over... and over again....
lead_paragraph: There is a reason why Juan Martin del Potro went under the knife -- over... and over... and over again.

headline.print_headline: Del Potro Returns From Wilderness to Knock Out Wawrinka
